snippet: Brad Keselowski completed a flawless weekend at New Hampshire Motor Speedway, adding to Saturday’s Nationwide Series win with a Sprint Cup victory under a green-white-checkered finish.
abstract: Nascar driver Brad Keselowski completes flawless weekend at New Hampshire Motor Speedway, winning both Nationwide Series and Sprint Cup races.
lead_paragraph: Brad Keselowski completed a flawless weekend at New Hampshire Motor Speedway, adding to Saturday’s Nationwide Series win with a Sprint Cup victory under a green-white-checkered finish.
